attributes.action: Re-structure and give more power to the youth parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to see a reform in the Youth Parliament so that things can move faster and things can get done. We would also like the Parliament to have a little more power and media coverage.
The reform: 
Have the Youth Parliament meet at least 4 times a year and have committees that mirror the Adult Parliament.
Have an elected Youth Prime Minister and Junior Ministers for each committee. (i.e Transport, Health etc). These committees meet up 5 times a year (4 at sittings and one by itself and the power to call a sitting at anytime should be reserve for the Youth Prime Minister).
Each elected minister then can be in contact with the relevant minister at Westminster.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
